Text:
The description says, "Includes two CD-ROMs." That only applies to the book. They are not included with this e-book.

That said, this e-book is amazing. It contains a lot of hard to find information. Thanks!

Thanks to the seeder! (June 2007)

Now if we could just get a codec encoding guide posted to thepiratebay, so the rest of us could get the same quality of XviDs that the pro-seeders (like LOL, etc) get ...

Anybody got links to optimized xvid encoding guides? (please don't just point me to the doom forums...)
